phantom.net

Interface IDownloadMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadMonitor, UselessDownloadMonitor

    public interface IDownloadMonitor
    Represents a download monitor
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDownloadFailed(Exception e)
      Fired when a download fails
      void onDownloadFinished(long elapsed)
      Fired when the download finished
      void onDownloadProgress(double progress, double bytesPerSecond, long downloaded, double timeLeft, long elapsed)
      Fires 20 times a second
      void onDownloadStarted(long size)
      Fired when the download starts

    • Method Detail

      • onDownloadFailed

        void onDownloadFailed(Exception e)
        Fired when a download fails
        Parameters:
        e - the exception thrown

      • onDownloadProgress

        void onDownloadProgress(double progress,
                        double bytesPerSecond,
                        long downloaded,
                        double timeLeft,
                        long elapsed)
        Fires 20 times a second
        Parameters:
        progress - the progress (percent)
        bytesPerSecond - the bytes per second
        downloaded - the downloaded size
        timeLeft - the time left
        elapsed - the elapsed time

      • onDownloadFinished

        void onDownloadFinished(long elapsed)
        Fired when the download finished
        Parameters:
        elapsed - the total time elapsed

      • onDownloadStarted

        void onDownloadStarted(long size)
        Fired when the download starts
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the download or -1 if the url has no head size
